meanings.sent1: After eating, our bodies start metabolizing the food for energy.
meanings.sent2: Cells metabolizing nutrients help us stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: I imagine tiny workers inside me metabolizing food like a busy factory.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for life is like a fire metabolizing everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The image of cells metabolizing nutrients is like a bustling city at night.

meanings.definition: to break down substances in the body for energy
meanings.sent1: Metabolizing fats and sugars provides the body with fuel.
meanings.sent2: Our bodies are constantly metabolizing nutrients to keep us going.
meanings.sent3: I joked that my stomach was metabolizing the pizza at lightning speed.
meanings.sent4: The process of metabolizing nutrients is like a recycling plant in our bodies.
meanings.sent5: The thought of cells metabolizing substances is both fascinating and essential.

meanings.sent1: When we eat, our bodies start metabolizing the food into energy.
meanings.sent2: Metabolizing food is crucial for our daily activities.
meanings.sent3: I playfully told my friend that my body was metabolizing the burger into superpowers.
meanings.sent4: The concept of metabolizing food is like turning on a power generator.
meanings.sent5: The idea of cells metabolizing food is like a magical transformation within us.
